title: The deer-mice on Rift are way cuter than poros
body: I think we can all agree that this is an objective truth.

replies.body:
Wharf Rats are cuter.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/b7/Wharf_Rat_Ideation.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150815091706

Best part about Wharf Rats; they grow up in to Razorfins.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9f/Razorfin_concept_2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150815091658

Awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=U3IAjw01,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-26T18:18:54.414+0000)
>
> Wharf Rats are cuter.
> 
> http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/b7/Wharf_Rat_Ideation.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150815091706

I don't disagree.

Poros are at the bottom of the adorableness food-chain, however.

excuse you.

the poros are at least in the middle, if not the top.

Your bias is disgusting.

Well cuteness isn't a universal constant, it's a concept. Thus is varying for individuals. As such bias takes effect here.

And with that in mind I say poros are at the bottom. Wharf Rats and Antler-Mice are better.
Okay, if it isn't a universal constant, then how were the researchers in the Howling Abyss able to create various effects with Poro Snax, thus harnessing their innate cuteness?
http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/018/816/its-magic-i-aint-gotta-explain-shit2.jpg
I don't think I've noticed them yet, or if I did im not remembering. Could you find an image?

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=U3IAjw01,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-26T18:39:04.574+0000)
>
> I don't think I've noticed them yet, or if I did im not remembering. Could you find an image?

These little guys http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xiG-KLQ-904/U_2924qmtjI/AAAAAAAAWOQ/iW8XEmYhvCM/s1600/BwCmnAnIcAALYhT.jpg
Yes. You are correct.

Ducks = EVIL

I see what you did there. ^^

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/271/481/621.png
They are called antler-mice ;) and yes, they are pretty adorable!

meh i still think poros are cuter
